aight, since last review:
- Moved 'clone' / 'cancel' buttons to the top navbar (next to 'preview', 'history', etc)
- Corrected bug in Header where relative path links would lead to 404
- Added test for the absolutePath util that Header now uses
- Added 'callout' styles for the `You are now cloning...` message, moved it to the right side of the page*

\* This 'design' is most definitely temporary, so I didn't spend much time tweaking it

@mythmon this is ready for another review (minus the `route: pt.object` propType deal)
